{!Account.Name}
Dear Mr. Forrster -
I work with Borrego Solar, a national solar company that provides solar to schools at no cost. We design, install, operate and maintain the solar system at your institution with no up-front cost and no financial risk. You simply purchase clean, renewable solar power from us at a discount to what you currently pay for electricity.
Antioch USD is qualified for the same no money down financing we’ve secured for schools across the Country. Without any capital outlay, your school will be able to go solar, reduce their carbon footprint, be protected from rising energy rates, and save money on day one. There are no risks, because we pay all of the operations and maintenance costs.
For 30 years, Borrego Solar has been working to help schools go solar. Some of our recent customers include:
University of California, San Diego College of Marin Lagunitas School District Marin Country Day School Novato Charter School Laguna Beach School District San Diego Community College District New Haven Unified School District Massachusetts Institute of Technology Smith College Hopkinton School District Sierra Community College District Peralta Community College District Projects like these bring jobs to the local community, provide positive public relations, and improve school operating budgets. When you have a moment, please give me a call as I'd love to learn more about your solar and sustainability goals. Also, if there is a person on campus who is already thinking about this issue, please forward this email.
Thanks in advance for your time, and I'll look forward to speaking with you soon.
Best regards,
David Potovsky Senior Project Developer
